author: larryi
msg: Removed extra semicolon causing handleError() to always use default handler.
Also added missing lines to handleError() so JSP error pages work.
Finally, added res.resetBuffer() call.  Since the default handling doesn't
supply a complete HTML page, resetBuffer() is called only if non-default
handling is used.  Modified handleStatus() to have the same behavior
for the same reason.  If this isn't appropriate, someone please correct.

author: costin
msg: Removed the discussion on performance - it will be a separate document.
( and it'll have slides too - before ApacheCon2000 )

author: costin
msg: Added a small comment to PolicyInterceptor.
Right now only Jasper is using the protection domain - everything else is
